chunk:
Foyo Face Mo' Hydration For Dry or Dull Skin (2020 formulation)

Brand: Foyo Face

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Rose Clay, Kaolin Clay, Cacao, Whole Dry Milk, Honey, Aloe Vera, Avocado Seed.

Directions: Mix 1 TBSP each of mask and water. Stir to make a paste. Apply to clean damp face. Leave on until dry. Rinse and pat dry. Repeat 1-2 times a week.
book: 1445-Foyo Face Mo' Hydration For Dry or Dull Skin (2020 formulation)
